text: Iterate a list as pair (current, next) in Python
I sometimes need to iterate a list in python looking at the "current" element and the "next" element.
I have, till now, done so with code like:

code:
for current, next in zip(the_list, the_list[1:]):
    # do something

text: This works and does what I expect -- just wondering if there's a more idiomatic or efficient way to do the same thing.
